alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 9:15AM CST until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bodcau Bayou At Bayou Bodcau Lake affecting Webster and Bossier Parishes. For the Bodcau Bayou...including Bayou Bodcau Lake...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bodcau Bayou At Bayou Bodcau Lake. * WHEN...From Friday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 169.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday evening and continue rising to 178.0 feet Friday, January 13. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 172.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 915 AM CST.
